body: You can move between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often.
name: Shadow Ghost
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/New Racial Rules/Fetchling Feats/Shadow Ghost

sections.body: You gain the ability to use shadow walk an additional time each day.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You may select this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Special
